overview:
Harjeet Kaur is a Senior Software Engineer (QA) cum Coordinate Management Representative with over 5 years of ongoing experience in Manual Testing and in a wide variety of projects and environments.

Harjeet started her career as a trainer and then shifted to QA. Harjeet is well versed in Black Box Testing techniques. She has done QA for Web as well as Desktop applications. Sheâ€™s expertise in writing Quality Plans, Test scenarios, Test Cases and executes them finding bugs, Bug Reporting & Tracking using Project Management/Bug Tracking tools like ACE & JIRA. She plays a role of mentor, coordinator and leader within team & organization; to understand requirement functionality; and processes in the company. She has worked with clients of different regions and has good communication skills.

Harjeet ids currently a FAR (Functional Area Representative) member and ATM (Appraisal Team Member) for CMMI3 Dev 1.2 Certification. She has experience in conducting Project Reviews and Audits and managing the SQA Team in a very well and organized way.
